titleStmt.title: Copy of a Request for Transfer of Taxation
titleStmt.author: Dusarios

msContents.summary: Dusarios son of Valens requests a transfer of tax responsibility for ceded land to Theodoros son of Obodianos (copy of P.Petra III 23)

msItemStruct.note: Left margin ca. 16cm, right ca. 13cm; 6 lines; with the fibers

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: (40.1) ..... called Erak [and] Mal el-[Kouesir] or [Serg] Noff(a), located..... (40.6) ..... by which I request you to relieve my person, estate, and [total assessment,] from the tax assigned to me for the said [property] as a result of a transaction performed between me and the aforementioned most magnificent Patrikios, that is, for half and a quarter (iugum) for free iugerum and to burden with this the person, estate, and total assessment of the said most honorable Theodoros [from] the eighth indiction, which is coming with (the will of) God, for all following time in accordance with what the most honorable Theodoros himself, also [present,] agreed to and signed. For your security and the (security) of the public treasury, [and also of ourselves,] this notification has been made, on which I, too, have signed below. (chi-rho) (I,) the aforementioned [Flavius] Dusarios, [son of Valens,] have requested that I be relieved of the tax assigned to me for the above-mentioned [property, called the Place Erak el-Kouesir or Serg] Laffa, being in..... six more [or less, that] is, [half] and a quarter (iugum).....
